00037 #include "egs_prism.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 #include <vector>
00041 using std::vector;
00042 
00043 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prismX("EGS_PrismX");
00044 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prismY("EGS_PrismY");
00045 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prismZ("EGS_PrismZ");
00046 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prism("EGS_Prism");
00047 
00048 extern "C" {
00049 
00050 EGS_PRISM_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00051 
00052     if( !input ) {
00053         egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): null input?\n");
00054         return 0;
00055     }
00056     string type;
00057     int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00058     if( err ) {
00059         egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): missing 'type' input\n");
00060         return 0;
00061     }
00062     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00063     vector<EGS_Float> p;
00064     err = input->getInput("points",p);
00065     if( err ) {
00066         egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): missing 'points' input\n");
00067         return 0;
00068     }
00069     bool open = true;
00070     vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00071     err = input->getInput("closed",tmp);
00072     if( !err && tmp.size() == 2 ) open = false;
00073     bool p_open = false; int itmp;
00074     err = input->getInput("open triangle",itmp);
00075     if( !err && itmp == 1 ) p_open = true;
00076     if( input->compare(type,__prismX) || input->compare(type,__prismY)
00077         || input->compare(type,__prismZ) ) {
00078         int np = p.size()/2;
00079         if( np < 3 ) {
00080             egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): at least 3 points are required "
00081                  "to construct a prism\n"); return 0;
00082         }
00083         vector<EGS_2DVector> points;
00084         for(int j=0; j<np; j++) points.push_back(EGS_2DVector(p[2*j],p[2*j+1]));
00085         if( open ) {
00086             if( input->compare(type,__prismX) )
00087                 g=new EGS_PrismX(new EGS_PolygonYZ(points,
00088                             EGS_XProjector(__prismX),p_open));
00089             else if( input->compare(type,__prismY) )
00090                 g=new EGS_PrismY(new EGS_PolygonXZ(points,
00091                             EGS_YProjector(__prismY),p_open));
00092             else
00093                 g=new EGS_PrismZ(new EGS_PolygonXY(points,
00094                             EGS_ZProjector(__prismZ),p_open));
00095         }
00096         else {
00097             if( input->compare(type,__prismX) )
00098                 g=new EGS_PrismX(new EGS_PolygonYZ(points,
00099                            EGS_XProjector(__prismX),p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00100             else if( input->compare(type,__prismY) )
00101                 g=new EGS_PrismY(new EGS_PolygonXZ(points,
00102                            EGS_YProjector(__prismY),p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00103             else
00104                 g=new EGS_PrismZ(new EGS_PolygonXY(points,
00105                            EGS_ZProjector(__prismZ),p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00106         }
00107     }
00108     else {
00109         int np = p.size()/3;
00110         if( np < 3 ) {
00111             egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): at least 3 points are required"
00112                     " to construct a prism\n"); return 0;
00113         }
00114         vector<EGS_Vector> points;
00115         for(int j=0; j<np; j++)
00116             points.push_back(EGS_Vector(p[3*j],p[3*j+1],p[3*j+2]));
00117         EGS_Vector aux(points[np-1]-points[0]);
00118         if( aux.length2() > 1e-6 ) points.push_back(points[0]);
00119         np = points.size();
00120         EGS_Projector pro(points[0],points[1],points[np-2],__prism);
00121         vector<EGS_2DVector> p2;
00122         {for(int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00123             p2.push_back(pro.getProjection(points[j]));
00124             EGS_Float d = pro.distance(points[j]);
00125             if( fabs(d) > 1e-6 ) {
00126                 egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): "
00127                         "points are not on a plane\n"); return 0;
00128             }
00129         }}
00130         if( open ) g = new EGS_Prism(new EGS_Polygon(p2,pro,p_open));
00131         else g = new EGS_Prism(new EGS_Polygon(p2,pro,p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00132     }
00133     g->setName(input);
00134     g->setMedia(input);
00135     g->setLabels(input);
00136     return g;
00137 }
00138 
00139 }
